Text:
Thanks for the up!

It's ironic really. I was more than willing to buy the album, but after almost a month. Still no digital download.

It's like they don't want people's money.
Thank you so much for uploading! ^_~

Holybasil, the digital download finally came online a couple of days ago, I've actually paid for nearly all of their albums but..i'm broke now.. btw... uploader, any chance of getting the instrumental version of this album too?

Sorry calicojax, I don't have the instrumental version of this album. :(

You are all very welcome. ^_^
